definition[0]: when something blocks a road, passage, tube etc, or the thing that blocks it
example[0]: an operation to remove an obstruction from her throat
example[1]: Police can remove a vehicle that is causing an obstruction.
example[2]: an unlawful obstruction of the highway
definition[1]: when someone or something prevents or delays a legal or political process
example[3]: He was found guilty of obstruction of justice.
definition[2]: an offence in football, hockey etc in which a player gets between an opponent and the ball
